<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>We
take your privacy very seriously. We ask that you read this privacy notice
carefully. It sets out important information about the operation of your Fire
Angel Wi-Safe Gateway product and about:</span></p>

style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>

115%'>how and why we collect, store, use and share information about you</span></a><span
style='line-height:115%'> (known as "<b>personal data</b>");</span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraph style='text-indent:-18.0pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><a
name=WhoWeAre><b><span style='line-height:115%'>1.         WHO WE ARE</span></b></a></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Fireangel
Safety Technology Limited is a private limited company, registered under the
laws of England and Wales, with company number 3641019 and whose registered
address is Bridge House, 4 Borough Street, London Bridge, London, SE1 9QR. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>We
are the "controller" of personal data we collect from you or you
provide to us. This means that when we collect and use your personal data, we
are responsible for ensuring that your personal data is lawfully and properly
processed and our conduct is regulated by the General Data Protection
Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679) ("GDPR"). Our registration
number under the Data Protection Public Register is ZA062715.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>When
the following words with capital letters are used in this Privacy Notice, this
is what they mean: </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'>2.         PERSONAL DATA WE MAY COLLECT FROM YOU</span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%'>The following table explains what personal data we
will or may collect about you and how it will be collected.</span></p>

  Software version number ("<b>Product Information</b>"); </span></p>
  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:15.9pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;line-height:

  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:1.7pt;line-height:115%'><span

  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span
  style='line-height:115%'>We work closely with other parties (including, for
  example, Contract Service Providers, technical services providers and

  products and their operation and we may receive information from those other
  parties about you, about the Product, the Product Software and/or the

  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span

  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><u><span
  style='line-height:115%'>The personal data provided to us may include:</span></u><span
  style='line-height:115%'> your first and last names, your email address and/or

  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span
  style='line-height:115%'> </span></p>
  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><u><span
  style='line-height:115%'>This personal data will be provided to us by third
  parties</span></u><span style='line-height:115%'>, including the entity who
  installed the Product in the premises where it is located.</span></p>
  </td>

<p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%'>We need to collect the above personal data, so that
the Product can perform its function and so that we can provide the Service. If
you do not provide the above personal data to us, it may prevent the Product
and Product Software from operating correctly and it may delay or prevent us
from providing the Service. </span></p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'> </span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'>3.         <a name=HowAndWhyWeUseYourPersonalData>HOW
AND WHY WE USE YOUR PERSONAL DATA</a></span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Under
the GDPR, we can only use your personal data if we have a legal basis for doing
so. The legal basis on which we use your personal data is that the use of your
personal data described in the table below <i>is necessary for the performance
of that contract with you or to take steps, at your request, before entering
into that contract</i> (i.e. your agreement to the <i>End User Licence
Agreement</i> forms a contract between you and us, under which we
are legally bound to provide the Service (subject to the terms and conditions
set out in the <i>End User Licence Agreement</i>)). </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>We
use the information we collect about you (i.e Submitted Information, Product
Information, Operational Information and Third Party Information) in the
following ways:</span></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none'>

  style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
  style='line-height:115%'>monitor the Product and its operation and use in

  we will use the information we gather to understand the frequency of risk

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>We
may also use the information you provide to us in an aggregated and anonymous
form for research purposes and to help us make development, marketing, sales
and/or other business decisions. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>We
may associate/combine any category of information with any other category of
information (for example, we may associate/combine Submitted Information with
Third party Information) and will treat the combined information as personal
data in accordance with this Privacy Notice for as long as it is combined. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'> </span></p>

115%'>We may need to share your personal data with other third parties</span></b><span

<p class=Bullet2 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     
</span></span><i><span style='line-height:115%'>where disclosure of the
information is in our legitimate interests (i.e. for the success, growth and
protection of our business), including:</span></i></p>

<p class=Bullet1 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:35.45pt;text-indent:-21.25pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:"Courier New"'>o<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>   
</span></span><span style='line-height:115%'>with prospective sellers or buyers
of businesses or assets, if we plan to sell or buy any business or assets, but
we will only do so after the prospective seller or buyer has entered into an
agreement with us to protect the confidentiality and security of your personal
data;</span></p>

<p class=Bullet1 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:35.45pt;text-indent:-21.25pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:"Courier New"'>o<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>   
</span></span><span style='line-height:115%'>if Fireangel Safety Technology
Limited or substantially all of its assets are acquired by a third party, in
which case personal data held by it about users of the Product/Product Software/Service
will be one of the transferred assets;</span></p>

<p class=Bullet1 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:35.45pt;text-indent:-21.25pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:"Courier New"'>o<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>   
</span></span><span style='line-height:115%'>in order to enforce or apply the EULA
and/or any other agreements or to investigate potential breaches and/or to
protect the rights, property or safety of Fireangel Safety Technology Limited,
our customers, or others.</span></p>

<p class=Bullet2 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>     
</span></span><i><span style='line-height:115%'>where disclosure of the
information is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which we are
subject, including:</span></i></p>

<p class=Bullet1 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:35.45pt;text-indent:-21.25pt;line-height:115%'><span
style='line-height:115%;font-family:"Courier New"'>o<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>   
</span></span><span style='line-height:115%'>if we are under a duty to disclose
or share your personal data in order to comply with any legal or regulatory
obligation or request, in which case we may have to disclose your personal data
to law enforcement agencies and regulatory authorities.</span></p>

<p class=Bullet1 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:0cm;text-indent:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:
115%'>We may allow other IT service providers to handle your personal data if
we are satisfied that we have a legal basis to share the same with them and
they take appropriate measures to protect your personal data. </span></p>

<p class=Bullet1 style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:6.0pt;
margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:
115%'> </span></p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'>5.         WHERE WE STORE YOUR PERSONAL DATA</span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Personal
data you provide to us by corresponding with us by telephone, email or
otherwise howsoever will be filed and stored at our offices (at Fireangel
Safety Technology Limited, Vanguard Centre, Coventry, CV4 7EZ).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Information
which we collect from and about you (including Submitted Information, Product
Information and Operational Information) will also be stored using the Amazon
Cloud service, via an account which we control and administer. The information
stored using the Amazon Cloud service is a distributed cloud platform, and
therefore the information we collect is not stored at one specific address.
Nevertheless, all the information you provide to us and which we collect will
be stored at a destination within the European Economic Area ("EEA").
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'> </span></p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><a
name=HowLongWeKeepYourPersonalData><b><span style='line-height:115%'>6.         HOW
LONG WE WILL KEEP YOUR PERSONAL DATA</span></b></a></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>We
will hold your personal data for the following duration:</span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraph style='margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;
line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
style='line-height:115%'>Submitted Information: For as long as your
subscription to the FireAngel connect system (i.e. the Service) remains live,
plus 3 years; </span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraph style='margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;
line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
style='line-height:115%'>Product Information: For as long as your subscription
to the FireAngel connect system (i.e. the Service) remains live, plus 3 years;</span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraph style='margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;
line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
style='line-height:115%'>Operational Information: For as long as your
subscription to the FireAngel connect system (i.e. the Service) remains live,
plus 3 years;</span></p>

<p class=MsoListParagraph style='margin-left:14.2pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;
line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
style='line-height:115%'>Third Party Information: For as long as your
subscription to the FireAngel connect system (i.e. the Service) remains live,
plus 3 years. </span></p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><span
style='line-height:115%'>We will not retain and process your personal data other
than for the purposes set out in this Privacy Notice. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><span
style='line-height:115%'>When it is no longer necessary to retain your personal
data, we will delete or anonymise it. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><span
style='line-height:115%'> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><a
name=YourRights><b><span style='line-height:115%'>7.</span></b></a><span
style='line-height:115%'>         <b>YOUR RIGHTS</b></span></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>You have
the following rights in respect of your Personal Data, which you can exercise
free of charge (unless your request is manifestly unfounded or excessive, in
which case we may charge you a reasonable fee or refuse to act on the request):</span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  background:#EEECE1;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><b><span style='line-height:115%'>Right</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;background:#EEECE1;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><b><span style='line-height:115%'>Description</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Access</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The
  right to be provided with a copy of your personal data.</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Rectification</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The right
  to require us to correct any mistakes in your personal data.</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>To be
  forgotten</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The
  right to require us to delete your personal data - in certain situations.</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Restriction
  of processing</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The
  right to require us to restrict processing of your personal data — in certain
  circumstances (e.g. if you contest the accuracy of the personal data).</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Data
  portability</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The
  right to receive the personal data you provided to us, in a structured,
  commonly used and machine-readable format and/or transmit that data to a third
  party  — in certain situations.</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>To
  object</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The
  right to object:</span></p>
  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:15.9pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;line-height:
  115%'><span style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
  style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
  style='line-height:115%'>at any time to your personal data being processed
  for direct marketing (including profiling);</span></p>
  <p class=afterhead2 style='margin-left:15.9pt;text-indent:-14.2pt;line-height:
  115%'><span style='line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span
  style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>      </span></span><span
  style='line-height:115%'>in certain other situations to our continued
  processing of your personal data (e.g. processing carried out for the purpose
  of our legitimate interests).</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=196 valign=top style='width:147.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>Not to
  be subject to automated individual decision-making</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=423 valign=top style='width:317.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
  6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>The
  right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing
  (including profiling) that produces legal effects concerning you or similarly
  significantly affects you.</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>For
further information on each of those rights, including the circumstances in
which they apply, please contact us or consult  the <span class=MsoHyperlink>guidance
issued by the UK Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO) on individuals’ rights
under the General Data Protection Regulation</span>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'>If you
would like to exercise any of those rights, please:</span></p>

<p class=MsoListBulletCxSpFirst align=left style='margin-left:42.55pt;
text-align:left;text-indent:-42.55pt;line-height:115%'><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>                        
</span></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%'>email, or write
to us (see below: ‘<b>How to contact us</b>’);</span></p>

<p class=MsoListBulletCxSpMiddle align=left style='margin-left:42.55pt;
text-align:left;text-indent:-42.55pt;line-height:115%'><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>                        
</span></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%'>let us have
enough information to identify you </span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
line-height:115%'>(e.g. your full name, address and client or matter reference
number);</span></p>

<p class=MsoListBulletCxSpMiddle align=left style='margin-left:42.55pt;
text-align:left;text-indent:-42.55pt;line-height:115%'><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>                        
</span></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%'>let us have proof
of your identity and address (a copy of your driving licence or passport and a
recent utility or credit card bill); and</span></p>

<p class=MsoListBulletCxSpMiddle align=left style='margin-left:42.55pt;
text-align:left;text-indent:-42.55pt;line-height:115%'><span style='font-size:
11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>                        
</span></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%'>let us know what
right you want to exercise and the information to which your request relates.</span></p>

<p class=MsoListBulletCxSpLast align=left style='margin-left:42.55pt;
text-align:left;text-indent:0cm;line-height:115%'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
line-height:115%'> </span></p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'>8.</span></b><span style='line-height:115%'>         <b>KEEPING
YOUR PERSONAL DATA SECURE</b></span></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'>We have appropriate
security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost,
or used or accessed unlawfully. Those processing your information will do so
only in an authorised manner and are subject to a duty of confidentiality.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'>We have procedures
in place to deal with any suspected data security breach. We will notify you
and any applicable regulator of a suspected data security breach where we are
legally required to do so.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'> </p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><a
name=Complain><b><span style='line-height:115%'>9.</span></b></a><span
style='line-height:115%'>         <b>HOW TO COMPLAIN</b></span></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'>We hope<b> </b><span
class=AlternativeText><span style='font-weight:normal'>we</span></span><b> </b>can
resolve any query or concern you may raise about our use of your personal data
(see below <span style='line-height:115%'>‘<b>How to contact us</b>’)</span>. </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'>The <span
class=MsoHyperlink>General Data Protection Regulation</span> also gives you the
right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the
European Union (or European Economic Area) state where you work, normally live
or where any alleged infringement of data protection laws occurred. The
supervisory authority in the UK is the Information Commissioners Office, who
may be contacted at <span class=MsoHyperlink>https://ico.org.uk/concerns</span>
or telephone: <span class=InsertText>0303 123 1113</span>.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'> </p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%;border:none;padding:0cm'><b><span
style='line-height:115%'>10.</span></b><span style='line-height:115%'>       <b>CHANGES
TO THIS PRIVACY NOTICE</b></span></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:6.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
6.0pt;margin-left:0cm;text-align:justify;line-height:115%'>This Privacy Notice
was originally published in September 2016 and last updated in June 2018.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'>We may change this Privacy Notice
from time to time. <span style='line-height:115%'>Any changes we may make to
our Privacy Notice in the future will be posted on our website (at </span>https://www.fireangel.co.uk/<span
style='line-height:115%'>) and, where appropriate, notified to you by e-mail.
Please check our website frequently to see any updates or changes to this
Privacy Notice.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:115%'><span style='line-height:115%'> </span></p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0cm 0cm 1.0pt 0cm'>

style='line-height:115%'>       <b>HOW TO CONTACT US</b></span></p>

the personal data we hold about you. Our contact details are as follows:</p>
